casebody.data:
Cynthia G. Grosch v. Douglas R. Grosch (12496)

Laveky, Schallek and Hennessy, Js.

Argued January 3 decision released January 24, 1995 Joseph A. Hourihan, with whom, on the brief, were Joan Keating-McKeon and Robert J. Sickinger, law student intern, for the appellant (plaintiff). Paul Litman, with whom, on the brief, was Kent Mawhinney, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
